Title: Boy Erased
Writer: Garrard Conley (based on the memoir Boy Erased by), Joel Edgerton (written for the screen by)
Actors: Lucas Hedges, Nicole Kidman, Russell Crowe, Madelyn Cline
Plot: The son of a Baptist preacher unwillingly participates in a church-supported gay conversion program after being forcibly outed to his parents.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 11 wins & 47 nominations.
